trans-unit.source: Manipulates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that has been applied by a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> action.
trans-unit.target: 조작는 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> 여 적용 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref> 동작 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ## Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a ControllableStoryboardAction object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ##일시 중지, 다시 시작, 중지 또는 스토리 보드에 대화형으로 수 일시 중지, 제어 그렇지 않으면 다시 시작 하거나 다른 방식으로 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>대화형으로 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>속성의 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>ControllableStoryboardAction 개체를 사용 하 고 (같은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> 참조 하 여 제어할 수</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>지정 되어 있지는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>으로 시작한 후에 대화형으로 제어할 수 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 참조 [하는 방법: 한 스토리 보드 후 시작을 제어 하려면 이벤트 트리거를 사용 하 여](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) 자세한 정보에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> that began the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> you want to interactively control.

The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> that began the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> you want to interactively control.
The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
